item.title: Garden wall hanging over footpath/possibly about to fall, 13th July
item.description:
I was walking my dog along Murray Avenue last night and scraped my arm on this wall which is leaning over the pathway. I consider it to be dangerous. Not only because it’s hard to see it’s over hanging the public footpath, but today when I returned to photograph it, it looks like it’s ready to fall down on the footpath, or worse still, people. Please can you address this issue. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Murray Avenue, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
